alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Washington (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 23 at 4:57AM EST until December 24 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northern Maryland, northern and northwest Virginia and panhandle of West Virginia. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest wind speeds will be through this evening. Affects from the extreme cold could be made worse due to power outages.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Washington
